title: test whatsapp connection and qr code generation
description: Verify that the /connect POST endpoint successfully establishes a WhatsApp connection and returns a valid QR code for authentication.

title: test dynamic command module loading
description: Verify that the /commands/load POST endpoint dynamically loads a command module and responds with success status.

title: test dynamic command module unloading
description: Verify that the /commands/unload POST endpoint unloads a specified command module and responds with success status.

title: test bot responsiveness ping endpoint
description: Verify that the /ping GET endpoint returns a pong response with latency information indicating the bot is responsive.

title: test text translation functionality
description: Verify that the /translate POST endpoint correctly translates input text between specified languages and returns the translated text.

title: test weather information retrieval
description: Verify that the /weather GET endpoint returns accurate weather forecast information for a specified location.

title: test admin privilege addition
description: Verify that the /admin/add POST endpoint grants admin privileges to a specified user and returns confirmation.

title: test admin privilege removal
description: Verify that the /admin/remove POST endpoint revokes admin privileges from a specified user and returns confirmation.

title: test rock paper scissors game play
description: Verify that the /games/rps POST endpoint allows a user to play rock paper scissors with the bot and returns the game result.

title: test quiz game session start
description: Verify that the /games/quiz GET endpoint starts a quiz game session and returns the initial quiz question or game state.
